forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High -6C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 24F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Becoming windy late. Low near -10C. Winds E at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Becoming windy late. Low 16F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High -6C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 23F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -13C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 11F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 23F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 10F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High near 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around -10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 16F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Snow likely in the afternoon. High near -5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Snow likely in the afternoon. High near 25F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 23F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 34F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some snow showers around in the morning. Then a wintry mix expected in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow and ice expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early will give way to a mixture of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
